metadata.title: V2TX - Video to Text Converter Online | Free Video Transcription
metadata.description: V2TX is the best video to text converter online. Convert videos to text instantly with AI-powered transcription. Free 90s preview, export SRT, TXT, DOCX formats.
metadata.keywords: V2TX, video to text, video transcription, video to text converter, online video transcription, AI video to text, YouTube to text

See how our AI accurately handles various types of video content
From technical lectures to business meetings, from code tutorials to group discussions

interview.audio_info: Audio source: Customer interview recording | Duration: 3:42 | Language: English
interview.transcript:
Host: Today we have invited Mr. Johnson to share his company's experience in digital transformation.

Mr. Johnson: Thank you. Our company has been comprehensively promoting digital transformation since 2019, mainly focusing on three areas: first is the automation of internal processes...

Host: What was the biggest challenge encountered in this process?

Mr. Johnson: I think the biggest challenge is actually employee acceptance. Technology itself is not the problem, the key is how to help the team adapt to new working methods.

lecture.audio_info: Audio source: University open course | Duration: 15 minutes | Language: English
lecture.transcript:
Today we will explain the basics of neural networks in machine learning. Neural networks are computational models designed inspired by biological neural systems.

The simplest neural network contains three parts: input layer, hidden layer, and output layer. Each neuron receives input signals, processes them through activation functions, and then passes them to the next layer...

The backpropagation algorithm is the core algorithm for training neural networks, which adjusts the weight parameters in the network by calculating gradients.

meeting.audio_info: Audio source: Online meeting recording | Duration: 45 minutes | Language: English
meeting.transcript:
Manager Zhang: Hello everyone, today's meeting mainly discusses Q4 marketing strategy. Please have each department report on the current progress.

Marketing Manager Wang: We have completed competitive analysis and found that main competitors invest heavily in social media marketing...

Sales Manager Li: From sales data, the online channel conversion rate is 15% higher than expected, suggesting we should increase digital marketing investment.

podcast.audio_info: Audio source: Tech podcast | Duration: 28 minutes | Language: English
podcast.transcript:
Host: Welcome to this episode of Tech Frontier, I'm host Wang. Today we're talking about the latest applications of artificial intelligence in healthcare.

Guest: Hello everyone, I'm a product manager from a medical AI company. We recently launched a medical imaging diagnosis system based on deep learning...

Host: What's the accuracy rate of this system? How does it perform in actual clinical applications?

video_types.title: 📹 Supported Video Types
video_types.description:
Understand our transcription capabilities for different video types
And factors that may affect accuracy with solutions

factors.title: Loud background music
factors.solution: Suggest noise reduction or choosing sections with less music

factors.title: Multiple people speaking simultaneously
factors.solution: AI will try to identify the main speaker

factors.title: Dense professional terminology
factors.impact: Lower recognition rate for specialized vocabulary
factors.solution: Can be improved through custom vocabulary lists

accuracyNote.title: Accuracy Note
accuracyNote.description: Even under difficult conditions, our AI maintains a high baseline accuracy. The system automatically detects audio quality and provides confidence scores to help you judge the reliability of transcription results. For important content, we recommend using clear audio sources for best results.

output_formats.title: 📄 Export Formats and Their Uses
output_formats.description:
Multiple professional formats for different needs
From video production to document editing, from API integration to data analysis

formats.name: SRT
formats.tip: Most common subtitle format, supported by almost all players

formats.name: VTT
formats.tip: Preferred format for web videos, supports rich styling

formats.name: ASS
formats.tip: Suitable for professional video production requiring complex styles and effects

formats.name: DOCX
formats.tip: Convenient for further editing and formatting, supports inserting images and tables

formats.name: PDF
formats.tip: Suitable for formal documents and reports, ensures consistent display across devices

formats.name: TXT
formats.tip: Most concise format, suitable for further processing and analysis

formats.name: JSON
formats.tip: Contains complete metadata information, suitable for secondary development and data analysis

formats.name: CSV
formats.tip: Convenient for statistical analysis and batch data processing

formats.name: XML
formats.tip: Suitable for enterprise-level system integration and complex data exchange needs

quick_start.title: 🚀 Get Started in 30 Seconds
quick_start.description:
No complex setup required, complete video-to-text in 4 simple steps
From upload to download, the entire process is simple and efficient

steps.title: Upload Video
details: Support MP4, MOV, AVI, WMV and other formats
Or paste YouTube, Vimeo links directly

steps.title: Select Language (Optional)
details: Can improve accuracy with manual selection

steps.title: Click Transcribe
details: Processing time depends on video length
Usually completes in 1/10 of video duration

steps.title: Download Results
details: Support SRT, VTT, TXT, DOCX formats

list.title: Clearer video, higher accuracy
list.description: Recommend using high-quality audio source, avoid background noise interference

list.title: Can test with free quota first
list.description: 90-second free preview, purchase full service when satisfied

list.title: Batch processing saves more time
list.description: Support simultaneous upload of multiple files, batch transcription more efficient

list.title: Multi-user collaboration feature
list.description: Support team project sharing, collaborative editing of transcription results

video_types.title: 📹 Video Type Compatibility
video_types.description:
Optimized for different content types with specialized processing
See which formats work best for your specific use case

factors.title: Heavy Background Music
factors.impact: Audio mixing interferes with speech recognition
factors.solution: Use audio tracks with clear vocal separation

factors.title: Multiple Overlapping Speakers
factors.impact: Simultaneous speech is difficult to separate

factors.title: Technical Jargon Heavy Content
factors.impact: Specialized vocabulary may not be recognized
factors.solution: Custom vocabulary lists available in Pro

accuracyNote.title: 📊 Accuracy Expectations
accuracyNote.description: These percentages represent typical performance. Actual results may vary based on audio quality, speaker clarity, and content complexity. Pro users can improve accuracy with custom vocabulary and noise reduction features.
